prophet.name: Elder
prophet.goal: Identify the saboteur and exile them each round

medium.name: Surveyor
medium.ability: View summary of all AI instructions from last round
medium.result: Cannot identify individuals. Only overall impression
medium.goal: Share if any suspicious instructions were given

citizen.name: Carpenter
citizen.goal: Use deduction and discussion to find the saboteur

apostle.name: God's Apostle
apostle.ability: Disguise as human and give sabotage instructions
apostle.goal: Destroy the app without getting caught

gameFlow.heading: Game Flow
gameFlow.subtitle: Victory is determined after 4 rounds (4 days)

phases.heading: Phase Details
phases.subtitle: Click tabs to view details of each phase

action.name: Role Action
action.mediumAction: View summary of all AI instructions from last round

divine.name: Judgment
divine.silenceAction: If triggered, skip Discussion and Exile phases
divine.reversalAction: If triggered, adjectives mean the opposite (simple‚Üícomplex)
divine.warning: You never know when these will trigger!

talk.name: Discussion Phase
talk.desc: ~4 minutes of free discussion (skipped if Silence)

exile.name: Exile Phase
exile.desc: Vote to 'suspend' one player (skipped if Silence)
exile.noteAction: Exiled players don't die. They just can't give AI instructions that round
exile.strategyAction: If you identify the Apostle, you can neutralize them every round!

implement.name: Implement
implement.desc: Each player gives AI instructions (100 chars, no talking)
implement.apostleAction: Sneak in sabotage instructions without being caught
implement.warning: If Word Reversal is active, adjectives are flipped!

check.name: Check
check.desc: After AI execution, verify tower status

victory.heading: Victory Conditions
victory.subtitle: Determined at the end of Day 4
victory.checklistDesc: Are all of the following met at the end of the final round?

godWin.title: God Team Victory
godWin.condition: If the above conditions are not met
